name: Street Struggle
description:
Information

Defeat waves of ninjas and get to wave 10 to beat the boss! This is my first full game, it was made using the Godot engine. Feedback is greatly appreciated. I will try to fix any bug that you encounter as long as you explain what happened, if you don't know how to recreate it, that's fine, but I may not be able to fix it. you can suggest anything that you want to be added, to this game, as long as it's reasonable.

Also to people playing on the HTML5 version, the audio may glitch for you when you click play because it's loading. The downloaded version has better performance so if you have a Linux or a Windows, consider downloading the game.

Controls Basic Movement WalkSprintJumpW, A, S, DHold Shift (while walking)Space Combat AttackDash (can dash through enemies)Left Click/ZRight Click/X Credits

Ninja Sprite by: MoikMellah

Player and Parralax Background Sprite by Craftpix

Ninja Death smoke effect by NYKNCK

Explosion effect by ansimuz

Sound effects by SubspaceAudio, death sound effect by FromSoftware :)

Music by Tallbeard Studios

The rest of the game is by me
